evidence.title: Required evidence
evidence.description: When applying for this visa you are required to submit evidence proving that you qualify for the visa. This sections lays out what documents are required to be submitted when applying for the Highly Skilled Foreign Professional ({visaType}) visa.

options.none: I have no higher education degree

dual_degree.title: Multiple degrees
dual_degree.prompt: Do you hold degrees in multiple fields?

experience.title: Professional experience
experience.prompt: How many years of relevant professional experience do you have?

age.title: Age
age.prompt: How old are you at the time of application?

salary.title: Salary
salary.prompt: What is the expected yearly total compensation at your main activity?

patent_inventor.title: Patents
patent_inventor.prompt: Have you successfully patented any of your inventions?

conducted_financed_projects.title: Financing
conducted_financed_projects.prompt: Have you engaged in foreign government funded research at least 3 times?

published_papers.title: Published work
published_papers.prompt: Have you published at least 3 papers in academic journals listed in academic databases as the corresponding author?

recognized_research.title: Other achievements
recognized_research.prompt: Do you have any other research achievements which are recognized by Japan's Minister of Justice?

org_promotes_innovation.title: Innovation
org_promotes_innovation.prompt: Will you work for an organization which receives financial support measures for the promotion of innovation?

org_smb.title: SME act
org_smb.prompt: Is your organization recognized as a small or medium-sized enterprise under the Small and Medium-Sized Enterprise Basic Act?

org_promotes_highly_skilled.title: Highly skilled
org_promotes_highly_skilled.prompt: Does your organization receive support from local governments for promoting the acceptance of highly skilled foreign workers?

high_rnd_expenses.title: R&D expenses
high_rnd_expenses.prompt: Does your organization's total research & development costs exceed 3% of their total revenue?

growth_field.title: Growth field
growth_field.prompt: Will you be involved in a project in a growth field with the involvement of the relevant ministries and agencies?

certification.title: Certificates
certification.prompt: How many relevant national or IT certifications do you hold?

jp.title: Japanese ability
jp.prompt: What proof do you have for your Japanese ability?

options.jp_major: I have a major in Japanese

jp_uni_grad.title: Japanese university
jp_uni_grad.prompt: Did you graduate from a Japanese university or have you completed a graduate program in Japan?

uni_ranked.title: Ranked university
uni_ranked.prompt: Did you graduate from a top 300 university?
uni_ranked.explanation:
Foreign universities need to be listed in at least two rankings, Japanese universities only need to be listed once.

  • QS World University Rankings
  • THE World University Rankings
  • Academic Ranking of World Universities

uni_funded.title: Funded university
uni_funded.prompt: Did you graduate from a university which receives subsidies from the Top Global Universities Project implemented by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology?

uni_partner.title: Partner university
uni_partner.prompt: Did you graduate from a university which is designated as a partner school in the Innovative Asia Project implemented by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs?

foreign_qualification.title: Recognized qualifications
foreign_qualification.prompt: Do you have any foreign work-related qualifications or awards which are recognized by Japan's Minister of Justice?

training_jica.title: Training by JICA
training_jica.prompt: Have you completed training conducted by JICA as part of the Innovative Asia Project by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs?

investment_management.title: Investment activities
investment_management.prompt: Will you engage in business related to investment management?
